name: ASUSTOR Lockerstor 4 Gen2
description: 4-bay NAS with Intel Celeron N5105 and 4GB DDR4. Features 2.5GbE, M.2 NVMe slots, and ADM OS with excellent app ecosystem. Great Synology alternative.

reviews.review_text: Great Synology alternative at lower price.
Fewer apps than Synology but covers basics.
